item.title: Skillcapes
item.dc:creator: @cwg452003 cwg452003
item.description:
@cwg452003 wrote:

This is credits all to me, i coded by myself. This makes it so when u type ::skillcapes you get whatever skillcapes that u have the lvl 99 in.
Search for

if (command.startsWith("barrows")

You most likely have that, if not just go under any command and add…

if (command.startsWith("skillcapes")) {//attack skillcape if(hasItemAny(11347,0)){ sendMessage("You already have the attack skillcape"); } if(playerLevel[0] >= 99 && !hasItemAny(11347,0)){ addItem(11347, 1); } if(hasItemAny(11349,0)){//defence skillcape sendMessage("You already have the defence skillcape"); } if(playerLevel[1] >= 99 && !hasItemAny(11349,0)){ addItem(11349, 1); } if(hasItemAny(10707,0)){//strength skillcape sendMessage("You already have the strength skillcape"); } if(playerLevel[2] >= 99 && !hasItemAny(10707,0)){ addItem(10707, 1); } if(hasItemAny(10725,0)){//hitpoints skillcape sendMessage("You already have the hitpoints skillcape"); } if(playerLevel[3] >= 99 && !hasItemAny(10725,0)){ addItem(10725, 1); } if(hasItemAny(11350,0)){//ranging skillcape sendMessage("You already have the ranging skillcape"); } if(playerLevel[4] >= 99 && !hasItemAny(11350,0)){ addItem(11350, 1); } if(hasItemAny(10716,0)){//prayer skillcape sendMessage("You already have the prayer skillcape"); } if(playerLevel[5] >= 99 && !hasItemAny(10716,0)){ addItem(10716, 1); } if(hasItemAny(10719,0)){//magic skillcape sendMessage("You already have the magic skillcape"); } if(playerLevel[6] >= 99 && !hasItemAny(10719,0)){ addItem(10719, 1); } if(hasItemAny(10758,0)){//cooking skillcape sendMessage("You already have the cooking skillcape"); } if(playerLevel[7] >= 99 && !hasItemAny(10758,0)){ addItem(10758, 1); } if(hasItemAny(10764,0)){//woodcutting skillcape sendMessage("You already have the woodcutting skillcape"); } if(playerLevel[8] >= 99 && !hasItemAny(10764,0)){ addItem(10764, 1); } if(hasItemAny(11360,0)){//fletching skillcape sendMessage("You already have the fletching skillcape"); } if(playerLevel[9] >= 99 && !hasItemAny(11360,0)){ addItem(11360, 1); } if(hasItemAny(11365,0)){//fishing skillcape sendMessage("You already have the fishing skillcape"); } if(playerLevel[10] >= 99 && !hasItemAny(11365,0)){ addItem(11365, 1); } if(hasItemAny(11367,0)){//firemaking skillcape sendMessage("You already have the firemaking skillcape"); } if(playerLevel[11] >= 99 && !hasItemAny(11367,0)){ addItem(11367, 1); } if(hasItemAny(10737,0)){//crafting skillcape sendMessage("You already have the crafting skillcape"); } if(playerLevel[12] >= 99 && !hasItemAny(10737,0)){ addItem(10737, 1); } if(hasItemAny(10752,0)){//smithing skillcape sendMessage("You already have the smithing skillcape"); } if(playerLevel[13] >= 99 && !hasItemAny(10752,0)){ addItem(10752, 1); } if(hasItemAny(10749,0)){//mining skillcape sendMessage("You already have the mining skillcape"); } if(playerLevel[14] >= 99 && !hasItemAny(10749,0)){ addItem(10749, 1); } if(hasItemAny(11357,0)){//herblore skillcape sendMessage("You already have the herblore skillcape"); } if(playerLevel[15] >= 99 && !hasItemAny(11357,0)){ addItem(11357, 1); } if(hasItemAny(10728,0)){//agility skillcape sendMessage("You already have the agility skillcape"); } if(playerLevel[16] >= 99 && !hasItemAny(10728,0)){ addItem(10728, 1); } if(hasItemAny(10734,0)){//thieving skillcape sendMessage("You already have the thieving skillcape"); } if(playerLevel[17] >= 99 && !hasItemAny(10734,0)){ addItem(10734, 1); } if(hasItemAny(10743,0)){//slayer skillcape sendMessage("You already have the slayer skillcape"); } if(playerLevel[18] >= 99 && !hasItemAny(10743,0)){ addItem(10743, 1); } if(hasItemAny(10767,0)){//farming skillcape sendMessage("You already have the farming skillcape"); } if(playerLevel[19] >= 99 && !hasItemAny(10767,0)){ addItem(10767, 1); } if(hasItemAny(11353,0)){//runecrafting skillcape sendMessage("You already have the runecrafting skillcape"); } if(playerLevel[20] >= 99 && !hasItemAny(11353,0)){ addItem(11353, 1); } }
